title: A QDM Patient-based Ratio Measure with Observations Example

cql_libraries.cql:
library QPRMOE version '0.0.002'

using QDM version '5.6'

valueset "Anticoagulant Therapy": 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.200'
valueset "Atrial Ablation": 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.203'
valueset "Comfort Measures": 'urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.33895.1.3.0.45'
valueset "Nonelective Inpatient Encounter": 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.424'

context Patient

define "Has Qualifying Encounter":
  exists ["Encounter, Performed": "Nonelective Inpatient Encounter"]

define "Has CM Performed":
  exists ["Intervention, Performed": "Comfort Measures"]

define "Has CM Ordered":
  exists ["Intervention, Order": "Comfort Measures"]

define "Has Ablation":
  exists ["Procedure, Order": "Atrial Ablation"]

define "Has Anticoagulant Therapy At Discharge":
  exists ["Medication, Discharge": "Anticoagulant Therapy"]

define "Is On Anticoagulant Therapy":
  exists ["Medication, Active": "Anticoagulant Therapy"]

define "IP":
  "Has Qualifying Encounter"

define "Denominator":
  "IP"

define "Denominator Exclusions 1":
  "Has CM Ordered"

define "Denominator Exclusions 2":
  "Has CM Performed"

define "Numerator":
  "Has Ablation"

define "Numerator Exclusions 1":
  "Has Anticoagulant Therapy At Discharge"

define "Numerator Exclusions 2":
  "Is On Anticoagulant Therapy"

define function "Denominator Observation"():
  1

define function "Numerator Observation"():
  2
